snippet: Christopher Houlihan performs works by Louis Vierne at Church of the Ascension.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert by the organist Christopher Houlihan, performing the symphonies of Louis Verne, at the Church of the Ascension in Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Houlihan performs works by Louis Vierne at Church of the Ascension.

headline.seo: Christopher Houlihan at Church of the Ascension
headline.main: Recalling the Sounds Of a Life Steeped in Woe
headline.print_headline: Recalling the Sounds Of a Life Steeped in Woe
